definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Yin2 hang2 ye4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中国银行业监督管理委员会

sentences.english: A foreign party is encouraged to deposit in the Bank of China any part of foreign exchange which he is entitled to remit abroad.
sentences.chinese: 鼓励外国合营者将可汇出的外汇存入中国银行。

sentences.english: Bank of China's subprime exposure significantly hurt the pace of earnings growth last year.
sentences.chinese: 中国银行的次债风险极大地损害了其去年的收益增长。

sentences.english: Wang Zhaowen, the bank's spokesman, declined to answer any questions.
sentences.chinese: 中国银行发言人王兆文拒绝回答任何问题。

sentences.english: Bank of China, Haizhu Xingang Branch, Guangzhou City, Guangdong Province.
sentences.chinese: 怎样给广东省异市的中国银行打入一笔钱？

sentences.english: The lower terminus is only a five-minute walk from the Bank of China Building.
sentences.chinese: 缆车终点离中国银行大楼只有五分钟路程。

sentences.english: At the Bank of China or at the foreign exchange desk in your hotel.
sentences.chinese: 在中国银行或在你住的旅馆里的外币兑换处。

sentences.english: Er hat zwar die Bank of China ausgeraubt, bleibt aber patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然抢了中国银行但还是爱国的。

sentences.english: You may refer to our bank, the Bank of China in London for our financial and credit standing.
sentences.chinese: 你方可向我往来行伦敦中国银行查询我方资信情况。

sentences.english: They are Gold Horse Company and Bank of China.
sentences.chinese: 它们分别是金马公司和中国银行。

sentences.english: Do you mean the Bank of China on Zhongshan road?
sentences.chinese: 你是要去中山路的中国银行吗？

sentences.english: Operator, please get me Bank of China, Beijing branch.
sentences.chinese: 接线员，请给我接中国银行北京分行。

sentences.english: Drafts and documents are to be couriered in one lot to Bank of China , Shanghai Branch.
sentences.chinese: 汇票和单据一次寄单至中国银行上海分行。

sentences.english: Please review and contact Bank of China, Beijing Branch, Beijing to collect the LC.
sentences.chinese: 请察看并联系中国银行北京分行接收这个信用证。

sentences.english: Participants will be notified when lottery results are available, and the payment process will be handled by the Bank of China.
sentences.chinese: 抽签结果会通知购票者，付款程序将由中国银行负责。

sentences.english: A county would often have a subbranch of the bank.
sentences.chinese: 通常情况下，县级市只设立中国银行支行。

sentences.english: Do you mean the Bank of China on Xianggang road?
sentences.chinese: 你是去香港路的中国银行吗？
